definition: sheet/piece of writing/bound set of bamboo slips used for record keeping (old)/classifier for written items: chapter, article

sentences.english: The Handmaid's Tale is her sixth novel.
sentences.chinese: 《侍女的故事》是她的第六部长篇小说。

sentences.english: A long story can sometimes be condensed into a few sentences.
sentences.chinese: 一个长篇故事常常可以缩写成几个句子。

sentences.english: It has taken a long time to wade through the 'incredible volume' of evidence.
sentences.chinese: 看完这一大卷“长篇累牍”的证词花费了很长的时间。

sentences.english: Short stories and romance novels are forms of fiction.
sentences.chinese: 普赖尔先生把他的短篇小说扩展成长篇小说。

sentences.english: A sketch of the long report by the budget committee was submitted to the mayor for approval.
sentences.chinese: 预算委员会的长篇报告的梗概已提交市长批示。

sentences.english: Sayings of the power over long-winded.
sentences.chinese: 语录体的力量超过长篇大论。

sentences.english: He has been preparing for this long novel and has finally started to write it.
sentences.chinese: 他准备了很长时间的这部长篇小说，终于开笔了。

sentences.english: I ve never heard such a rigmarole .
sentences.chinese: 我从来没听过像这样的长篇废话。

sentences.english: His long, improvised dirges will ring forever in my ears.
sentences.chinese: 他长篇与即兴的哀歌将永远回绕于我的耳际。

sentences.english: This text emphatically probes into the characteristic and meaning of Zhang Weis long novel .
sentences.chinese: 本文着重探讨张炜的长篇小说写作的特征与意义。

sentences.english: Hawthorne's reputation rests on his other novels and tales as well.
sentences.chinese: 霍桑的声誉还来自他的其他长篇和短篇小说。

sentences.english: "Fuxing Park" is Wu Jianxin's first full-length film.
sentences.chinese: 《复兴公园》是吴建新的第一部纪录长篇。

sentences.english: The theme of new-age historical novel is greatly broadened.
sentences.chinese: 新时期长篇历史小说的题材大为拓展。

sentences.english: They perform more by a gesture than others by a long harangue.
sentences.chinese: 他的一个手势所造成的影响，远胜于别人的长篇大论。

sentences.english: The novel earned him a literary award.
sentences.chinese: 这部长篇小说为他赢得文学奖。

sentences.english: Soon to be added to that list is the translation of a long fiction called "Wolf Totem".
sentences.chinese: 不久长篇小说《狼图腾》也加入了这个行列。

definition: serialized/published as a serial (in a newspaper)
